column3: Meters upstream of logger array (negative for downstream; OR supply coordinates)
column5: The width of the water surface at the time of measurement (meters)
column6: The width of the water surface at baseflow (estimated as the edge of terrestrial vegetation, eroded area, or a break in bank sediment; meters)
column7: The estimated width of the water surface at bankfull (meters)
column8: The height of the left bank when facing downstream (meters)
column9: The width of the left bank when facing downstream (meters)
column10: The height of the right bank when facing downstream (meters)
column11: The width of the right bank when facing downstream (meters)
column12: The vertical distance from current water level to estimated baseflow (meters)
column13: The vertical distance from current water level to estimated bankfull (meters)
